title: Imagine a Great Region
description: To provide programmatic planning support for the Imagine a Great Region program at the University of Colorado Denver. Support could include but is not limited to: entertainment, student stipends, travel awards and faculty support.
marketingContent: To provide programmatic planning support for the Imagine a Great Region program at the University of Colorado Denver. Support could include but is not limited to: entertainment, student stipends, travel awards and faculty support.
